Timecandy9.name: Timecandy9
Timecandy9.desc: A time candy that gives a random amount of time for a nonrandom cost of gems? How inexplicable! @ These candies give up to 500 hours, but on average give 24 hrs.

EquipmentHats82.name: EquipmentHats82
EquipmentHats82.desc: You can't be a real sorcerer without a big wizard hat! Comes with a +5% All Stats bonus, so your STR AGI WIS LUK will be in good hands!

EquipmentKeychain11.name: EquipmentKeychain11
EquipmentKeychain11.desc: This keychain comes with +25% Drop Rate bonus! Currently, the best possible Drop Rate keychain is 16%, so this is the best Drop Rate Keychain in the game yo!

desc: Super close to getting a rose? Well don't worry I'll give you one more shot... good luck! Buying this will give you 100 Valenslimes Day Choco boxes.
